headline.main: ITALY'S INDUSTRIES GO ON RATION BASIS; Minister of Corporations Is Empowered to Requisition and Allot Materials

lead_paragraph: ROME, Dec. 31 -- The ground was cleared for further rationing in Italy today when the Official Gazette published a decree empowering Minister of Corporations Renato Ricci to control Italian industry and regulate the distribution and consumption of all domestic and imported industrial materials during the war period.
abstract: Italy: Min R Ricci given power over indus and raw materials except foods; visiting Germans reptd buying goods rationed at home
